item.description:
Learn about your relationship preferences for each type, relationship dynamics between the types and ways to make it optimal! Herb has years of experience working with couples and families and relationship dynamics between the types. Don't miss this opportunity to learn what works better between the types and how to make it better whatever your types!

Optional macrobiotic delicious meal for $20 additional from 7 to 8:30pm. Need at least 1 days advance notice for this.

Led by Herb Pearce, M.Ed., in Counseling, who has led this workshop many times. He has done relationship counseling and relationship workshops for over 30 years. He's a leading expert in the Enneagram.

Herb Pearce, 781 648 3737, www.herbpearce.com, herb@herbpearce.com
item.name: Enneagram and Relationship Dynamics
